Text: oh... great! Been waiting for this one for quite a while. If you also have other prime films by Kaurismaki like Hamlet goes business, that would be highly appreciated. All best and many, many thanks.
Well i have Hamlet goes business and most of Kaurismaki films and i'll try to upload them by the time, just be patience.
My joy...knows no bounds. Waited for this for 2 years. That is, ever since I got to know Kaurismaki. Thanks a lot.
Many thanks. I got the movie now, but in Finnish language. How do I get English subs??

Thanks again whiteinkal for this great movie.
I like the movies from Aki Kaurismaki very much, thanks.
